short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talentium's official browser extension. Integrates Talentium platform in LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Talentium Connect will allow you to seamlessly integrate the Talentium recruitment platform in LinkedIn. You can browse LinkedIn for interesting candidates, like you would normally do, and connect them to the Talentium platform with one click.

You can send a candidate to a Job Pipeline or a Talent Pool, and you can also unlock emails and phone contacts. Finally, you can ask Talentium's powerful IUM assistant to help you write messages to the people you want to contact! IUM is powered by state-of-the-art AI technologies from OpenAI.
